Serialized Form

  • Package logic

    • Class logic.Character extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -8571121080640766560L

      • Serialized Fields

        • x

          int x
          x and y are the current coordinates relative to the position on Map.

        • y

          int y

        • prevX

          int prevX
          prevX and prevY are the coordinates relative to the position on Map. This represent the position occupied before the current position. Useful for collision control.

        • prevY

          int prevY

        • symbol

          char symbol
          symbol is the char representation of the class on Map.

        • hasWeapon

          boolean hasWeapon
          hasWeapon is the flag of the existence of a weapon in this Character.

        • isClub

          boolean isClub
          isClub is the flag that indicates if weapons is a Club

        • weapon

          Weapon weapon
          weapon is the Weapon that this Character has.

        • showCli

          boolean showCli
          showCli is the flag indicating if display should be used.

      serialVersionUID:

      • Serialized Fields

        • aboveKey

          boolean aboveKey
          aboveKey is the flag indicating overlaping of this Weapon and a Unlocker on Map.

    • Class logic.Drunken extends Guard implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -179875341590099576L

      • Serialized Fields

        • isSleeping

          boolean isSleeping
          isSleeping is a flag indicating if this Drunken "sleeping"

        • sleepCount

          int sleepCount
          sleepCount is the controller of how many rounds will this Character remain sleeping.

    • Class logic.Game extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      476316704894951892L

      • Serialized Fields

        • endGame

          boolean endGame
          endGame is a flag that indicates if it's the end of this game

        • showCli

          boolean showCli
          showCli is the flag indicating if display should be used.

        • level

          int level
          level is the indicator of the level being played or set to be played

        • levels

          java.util.ArrayList<E> levels
          levels is a container stores all levels that can be played in the current game session.

    • Class logic.Guard extends Character implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -6482594357189490814L

      • Serialized Fields

        • route

          char[] route
          Represents the array that stores the Guard's movements.

        • routeStep

          int routeStep
          Represents the current index of this Guard route array (updated everytime the Guard moves)

    • Class logic.Hero extends Character implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -332143168894865218L

      • Serialized Fields

        • escaped

          boolean escaped
          escaped is a flag indicating if this Hero has escaped throw the exit.

        • wallColliding

          boolean wallColliding
          wallColliding is a flag indicating if this Hero is colliding with a wall or a closed door.

        • objectColliding

          boolean objectColliding
          objectColliding is a flag indicating if this Hero is colliding with a lever or a key.

        • exitColliding

          boolean exitColliding
          exitColliding is a flag indicating if this Hero is colliding with an exit.

        • exitOpened

          boolean exitOpened
          exitOpened is a flag indicating if a door is opened or not.

        • captured

          boolean captured
          captured is a flag indicating if this Hero was captured (by a guard or by an ogre).

        • fatality

          boolean fatality
          fatality is a flag indicating if this Hero has suffered a fatality, if was hit by a weapon.

        • steppedGuard

          boolean steppedGuard
          steppedGuard is a flag indicating if this Hero has stepped on a sleeping guard.

    • Class logic.Map extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -3751192253702198623L

      • Serialized Fields

        • map

          char[][] map
          map is a 2D array that stores all objects/characters positioning information on the current Game cycle.

        • level

          int level
          level is an indicator to the type of level that is loaded.

        • doors

          java.util.ArrayList<E> doors
          doors is an ArrayList of Door that stores all possible exits for level completion.

        • characters

          java.util.ArrayList<E> characters
          characters is an ArrayList of Character that stores the Hero and Guard loaded on this Map.

        • ogres

          java.util.LinkedList<E> ogres
          ogres is a LinkedList of Ogre that stores all Ogres loaded on this Map.

        • unlockers

          java.util.ArrayList<E> unlockers
          unlockers is an ArrayList of Unlocker that stores all loaded keys/levers on this Map.

        • ogreNumber

          int ogreNumber
          ogreNumber is a helping variable used to initialize levels with Ogre

        • guardPersonality

          GuardPersonality guardPersonality
          guardPersonality is a helping variable used to initialize levels with Guard

        • showCli

          boolean showCli
          showCli is the flag indicating if display should be used.
